title: The Pride Adventures Vol. 1
description: Spinning out of The Pride, The Pride Adventures is an anthology of short stories expanding on your favourite characters and the world of the comic.In issue one, learn what makes White Trash such a tough guy; see FabMan make an unconventional rescue; and introducing the monstrous Outrage! What is the dark story of this armoured monstrosity, in a special tale told using the lyrics of the wonderful In This Shirt by The Irrepressibles!Stories by Joe Glass, and featuring art from Gavin Mitchell (Stiffs, Aces Weekly), Samir Barrett and Joshua Faith (Just Another Sheep), and an amazing cover by Kris Anka (Age of Apocalypse, Glory, Uncanny X-Force)
author: Joe   Glass
